column2:

n = 100,
legend.show = FALSE,
palette = "Reds") +
tm_shape(territories) + tm_borders(alpha=.3, col = "blue") +
tm_layout(frame = TRUE)+ tm_text("NOM", col = "yellow", size = .50)
